duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversight of safety and security of residents, employees, and property assets.
Coordinate security and safety efforts throughout the property.
Support the concierge function, covering concierge break times and shifts.
Respond to all type of emergencies and lead on security and safety issues.
Complete detailed incident and injury reports.
Investigate and document property and resident vehicle damage.
Monitor fire alarm panel, respond to emergency situations, and coordinate service elevators/lifts.
Handle all resident interactions with hospitality and professionalism, resolve complaints, and assist residents in all inquiries.
Process packages, messages, and mail accurately and timely.
Manage and provide access to the building(s) and units with all vendor/contractor/resident’s service providers and visitors.
Ensure that the Residential Lobby is in optimal condition of cleanliness and tidiness at all times.
Assist residents with parking and retrieving their vehicles, delivering or retrieving deliveries/luggage, and additional doorman tasks when needed.
Perform pool maintenance, complete daily mechanical equipment inspections, and act as the security/engineering Supervisor on duty.
Comply with all property/employer guidelines, policies and procedures.
Work harmoniously and professionally with co-workers and leaders.

education_certification.credential: Knowledge of safety practices in the workplace is preferred.
